font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj.阴沉的，丧葬的： causing or marked by an atmosphere lacking in cheer; funereal
【例】 the decrepit mansion had a sepulchral tone that gave everybody a chill 破旧的公馆有着一种坟墓的气息，让人皆为之一颤
【近】 depressing, desolate, dismal, dreary, morose, sullen, tenebrous
【反】 merry, bright, cheery, comforting, cordial, festive, heartwarming, sunshiny 欢快的

【记】 音：死 + pull + church 死后就拖到教堂，仪式完后，就进坟墓
